characters.brief: They took my loved ones. Back then I wasn’t strong enough to fight, but I studied, trained, and now I’m ready to cleanse the world of their taint. I’ll kill them all. That’s all I have left.

I can do things, things that normal people can’t. But there’s a price—I haven’t paid it in full, yet, but the bill’s gonna come due soon. It’s best I don’t tell you any more. You get too close, you’ll get hurt.

I feel the hunger, the lust to destroy. But I fight it: I never give in. I’m not human anymore, not really, but I have to protect those who still are. That way I can tell myself I’m different to the other monsters. Sometimes I can even believe it.
I have dedicated my life to the study of the unnatural. I know their habits, their weaknesses. I may not be youngest or strongest, but my knowledge makes me the biggest threat.

Yeah, I’ve been around the block. A bit of this, a bit of that. When I came across the secret underworld of monsters and magic... well... it wasn’t so different from the underworld I already knew. It was easy to find an angle, just like before.
I was built, not born. I don’t know by whom, but I know one thing: There’s something wrong in The Virtual., I must use my newfound awareness of the world to keep the system safe.

Although many in this modern world have forgotten the honor of the old ways, I have not. I am more than an athlete. More than a sports star. More than a mere wrestler. I am a hero of the people in the legendary tradition of El Santo. And, when necessary, a fighter of monsters. I AM A LUCHADOR!
